title: Ticket #1739: Add MonitorSelfCPU like attribute that includes children
description: We currently have an daemon classad attribute, set by daemoncore, MonitorSelfCPU. This is the load average by this daemon alone. For use with the schedd's START_LOCAL_UNIVERSE expression, we'd like to look a the whole load of the schedd and all it's local/scheduler universe children.
creator: gthain
